headline.main: Spring Breaks; Learn a New Cuisine

docs.lead_paragraph: TIRED of Chinese takeout, but still confused about sautéing versus stir-frying? There's a smorgasbord of weekend cooking classes, from fancy professional culinary schools to unfussy inns that specialize in comfort foods like New England boiled dinners.
docs.snippet: There's a smorgasbord of weekend cooking classes, from fancy professional culinary schools to unfussy inns that specialize in comfort foods like New England boiled dinners....

docs.abstract: Richard Jay Scholem reviews Gianni's Bar & Grill in Montauk, NY (A La Carte column) (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: THE bad news is that Caswell's, one of Montauk's few serious restaurants, is no more. The good news is it has reinvented itself as Gianni's Bar & Grill, a less expensive eating place with good, solid food, slightly lower ambitions and John Yashinowsky, one of the East End's better chef-owners, still presiding in the kitchen.

headline.main: Italian Cuisine With a Northern Flavor

docs.abstract: Patricia Brooks reviews Toscana restaurant in Ridgefield, Conn; photo (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: JUST walking into the dining room at Toscana in Ridgefield raises the spirits. With its excellent lighting and airiness, the room almost speaks of leisurely, comfortable dining. At least it spoke to me, on my first visit, and I wasn't just hearing things.

headline.main: Flying Solo: Killer Asteroids And Spa Cuisine

docs.abstract: Profile of and interview with Hollywood movie producer Jerry Bruckheimer, whose latest movie is Con Air, multi-million-dollar action extravaganza; photo (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: THE emblematic power producer of the 1980's, whose fast and flashy movies seemed to sprout out of the soul of the decade, slid unobtrusively out of the bright afternoon glare and into the muted power vapors of the Four Seasons restaurant in Manhattan. Jerry Bruckheimer reacted with a wan smile when a middle-aged man in a Madras jacket approached at the foot of the restaurant's staircase to congratulate him on his latest action blockbuster, ''Con Air,'' which elbowed three days earlier into the crowded roster of summer mega-flicks.
